short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group related PreditIt markets to find price anomalies between the markets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: plink is a Google chrome plugin that allows you to group related PredictIt markets into a single view. The intent is to allow you to find arbitrage opportunities or mispriced brackets in similar markets. For example, in a presidential election you could group markets you think are heavily favored for a particular party and quickly see any price anomalies between the markets.
